dmca.title: [ABUSE] Abuse & Terms Breech
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2005 3:45 PM
To: jdw917@comcast.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse & Terms Breech

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Jason Wagner <jdw917@comcast.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, <info@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, February 8, 2005, 3:33:22 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Abuse & Terms Breech

===8<==============Original message text===============
To Whom It May Concern:

I wanted to inform you of abuse to your company and your hosting system. The
website www.eminem-planet.com is currently hosting & displaying many copy
written lyrics, photographs and other materials for the artist Eminem
without permission. The lyrics for that are displayed are often very
un-accurate and are displayed without permission. The record company has
contacted this and other sites Webmasters without a single reply. Since this
site is listed at many lyric sources as lyrics.com for Eminem lyrics, it?s
strongly recommended that these lyrics be taken down.  As for the
photographs and other materials, I personally know that these photographers
& companies that own the copy write on the photographs will take action
without notice as I have been a party to these actions in the past. To
further add to the problem I strongly suggest you drop this client & site
from your hosting company to avoid any future lawsuits and actions.

I am a fellow site owner & hosting company and I thought you would like to
know of such abuse.

Thank you for your time.

Jason Wagner


===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCCTLevK/XpJs6oyURAjfvAJ99nHCc/awZzynWypA/kWlcR8uBWgCfSqxk
410XDdKcVXyf8IyTQPOdWG4=
=gwg7
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
